features: Glow Enhancing Make Up: Instantly hydrate and luminize your skin for an all over, natural glow with Lumi Glotion; This liquid face and body highlighter delivers an illuminating color tint to enhance your skin’s natural glow

Hydrating Makeup Highlighter: Our glow lotion is infused with glycerin and shea butter for all day hydration; Available in 4 shades for all skin tones, the glow drops can be worn alone, under foundation, or on target areas for a more luminous effect
Liquid Highlighter to Glow: Use Lumi Glotion illuminator to get a healthy, sun kissed glow with no sun; Try our complete line of bronzing drops, bronzers, luminizers, glow enhancing lotions
Because You're Worth It: Create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks and much more
L'Oreal Paris Beauty: A leading total beauty care company based in Paris, we offer innovative products and unique expertise from beauty experts in makeup, skin care, hair care, styling and hair color
body.description: Viral TikTok Favorite L'Oreal Paris True Match Lumi Glotion is a luminous tinted moisturizer infused with glycerin and shea butter for instant hydration and a radiant finish. The highlighting formula is lightweight and delivers an illuminating color tint for healthy, glowing skin. Use on face and body. Available in 4 shades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it alone over moisturizer on no makeup makeup days, just to blur things a little. Though, with nothing over it, have to apply super lightly and even still can look a little too greasy. But I kind of like that look.It's great under a light coverage liquid or powder foundation. I hate how foundation of any kind can end up looking chalky and weird, this adds a little healthy glow.I'm naturally extremely pale. Have some natural tan on my body as I live in a tropical climate, but none on my face because of religious face spf application. So i usually use makeup to warm my face a little to match my body. I bought the 2nd lightest shade and it's about perfect. Still looks very fair and matches my natural color, no artificial orangey brown, would likely still look perfect even without a tanner body. But isn't too ghastly/blue tinged. I would think that unless you're going for a full on Twilight/Cullen vampire look, this 2nd shade would work on most very pale girls and be too light for anyone with some color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ah-mazing product for that no-makeup look!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing! It's perfect for those of us who don't wear foundation, or a day when you don't feel like it. I don't wear much makeup (gotta show off all the money I spend on skin care!), just this, concealer, blush, and mascara. This gives me just the right amount of glow. I feel it evens out my skin tone but without coverage, if that makes sense. It's very hydrating and blends beautifully. It's definitely a glowy finish, but not glittery. I mix it with moisturizer if I want a bit less shine. It works great on my normal-combination skin, with powder and/or setting spray on my oilier spots but I would say, if you have oily skin, this might be a bit too hydrating and "slippery." You'd at least want to set it with powder, probably. I have medium-light skin with neutral undertones and I have the "Light" shade. If I were any paler, it might be too dark, but it works ok.I wish this had SPF, as there are some radiant primers with SPF and radiant sunscreens out there that I keep eyeballing. Other than that, this stuff is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give a great glow and blends well!
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a bronze, glow look to your makeup or just to wear by itself, I highly recommend this! In the winter I still like a bit of a glow without having to put on full blown makeup, this Glotion does the trick! I’ve used it with makeup as well. I like that it’s light weight and blends well. It’s a nice alternative (for the price) verses some of the other higher end brands. I was not impressed with the Drunk Elephant bronzing drops for example. This is more like the Tarte glow I was using but has a bit more color to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars TikTok made me buy it
reviews.reviewText: BUT... As an oily girly... I will not use it. Maybe the glistening skin is the "in thing" right now but I can't stand a shiny face on myself. Therefore, I will stick to being a matte girly for life. This will not be making the cut for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product good price ditch the designer brands
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it was on sale at Amazon and after reading the reviews I thought why not give it a try since my clarins product similar to this is almost used up I like this but would definitely not put it all over my face a little too shiny for that but I do like the way it feels going on I don't feel like it's clogging my pores and it does give a very nice glow I took a chance on which shade to buy and went on the manufacturer's website which helped guide me to choose the color. I've pretty much given up on buying expensive makeup unless I can get it at an outlet mall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love Lumi Glotion moisturizer and the big glow it gives me!
reviews.reviewText: The Lumi Glotion moisturizer is great and provides great hydration for my skin, while also giving light coverage on the days I don’t want to do heavy foundation and full makeup.For work, I have to do full makeup and it gets old and tiring. Not to mention it is so drying to my skin, especially in the winter.Wearing Lumi Glotion gives my skin a dose of hydration and feels so good. It’s lightweight and feels so refreshing on my face. The natural look works well with a bit of a glow. Just add some lipstick and mascara and you’re good to go.This is my first time using tinted moisturizer, so I don’t have anything to compare it too, but love it so far!I’ve been looking for something to use on the days I want to give my skin a break. My daughter recommended a tinted moisturizer. A beauty magazine recommended Lumi Glotion, saying it was a favorite and a big seller.Before spending a lot of money on something I wasn’t sure I would use, I decided to try L’Oréal’s Lumi Glotion moisturizer.I knew right away that I liked the product and have used it several times a week over the past 1.5 yrs.My 75 yr old mom tried it one day when we were out and she loved the way it felt and looked on her skin. So I gave her my brand new tube and ordered more for myself.Lumi Glotion It is the perfect small gift to surprise a friend or family member anytime of the year. It’s also a great stocking stuffer during the holidays. We all need to pamper ourselves a little more!L’Oréal Lumi Glotion is a must have and a great product for the price point. I will certainly be purchasing again!🩷💅💄💋

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right amount of shimmer
reviews.reviewText: If you want a subtle glow and do not like over the top shimmer then this is for you. I love the newest no makeup makeup look and this is the best glow lotion I have found. Use a very tiny amount of the product mixed with a very light weight facial moisturizer to give a very subtle glow without it looking like you’ve done excessive makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a dupe for the Drunk elephant bronzi drops and I think this was a great dupe and was pigmented. I have a lighter complexion and I bought the medium shade. Great way to get that glowy, bronzy, look without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewTitle: Get complimented every time I use it!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! I apply it in a thin layer, all over my face before applying my tinted moisturizer and find it provides a lovely subtle “glow” to my skin. A truly subtle highlight/illuminator. I do not apply it every day, just days when I feel I need a bit more brightness to my face and honestly, every single time I use it, someone comments on how lovely my skin looks.

reviews.reviewerName: Sabe súper amargo, no sabe a matcha.
reviews.reviewText: Deja un sutil brillo, se ve muy bonito en la piel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it came In great conditions great product

reviews.reviewerName: Product had no package and wasn’t sealed. Smells bad, strong alcohol smell.
reviews.reviewText: Safety concern due to the fact that it came unsealed and had no packaging. Had a really strong alcohol odor also. Kinda doubt that it is the original product. Really disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave to my Granddaughter as part of her Christmas present
